body.name: YUHFERA Silicone Electric Stove Cover Mat - 28 x 20 Ceramic Stove top Cover, Heat Resistant Glass Cooktop Cover, Flat RV Range Stovetop Protector, XL Dish Drying Mats for Kitchen

features: Glass Top Stove Cover：This extra large 27.55" x 19.68" inches silicone stove cover for glass top electric stove is perfect for protecting your electric stove top, kitchen counter top, electric cooktop, table, or washer-dryer top from scratches, spills, stains, scrapes, and dirt. It keeps the surface clean and tidy while providing an expandable workbench for food preparation.

Kitchen Drying Mat：The unique design of wide raised line ridges increases air circulation, improves ventilation, and catches drips from dishes, glasses, fruits, and vegetables. The high edges and waterproof bottom keep the countertop dry and clean, making it an ideal kitchen drying mat.

Anti Scalding Silicone Mat： Our glass-top stove cover doubles as a silicone trivet mat that can hold hot pots and pans. Heat resistant up to 450°F, its raised wide ridges separate the hot pot from the table and protect your kitchen surfaces from scalding. Please note: Do not put the electric cooktop cover on the electric cooktop while its temperature is over 450°F to prevent damage.

Easy To Clean：This stovetop counter cover will become very clean again and is effortless to clean and maintain. You can easily wipe off any spills or water droplets. For thorough cleaning, it can be directly rinsed or brushed with water or even tossed in a dishwasher. Its flexible material allows it to roll or fold up for hassle-free storage.

【Timely After-Sales Service】: We stand behind the quality of our hallway runner rug and promise a solution if it does not meet your expectations. Our customer service team is available 24/7 and will solve any issues within 48 hours. Protect your stove, enhance your counter space, and add a touch of elegance to your kitchen with our gas stove cutting board covers, stove covers for gas top or electric stoves, gas oven wood covers, electric stove covers with feet, and more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Product - Good Price
reviews.reviewText: This product fits well and looks nice. I don't use the glass top on my stove very often because using it for anything causes it to scratch and develop a gray discoloration on one burner. Don't know what that is from. Bought in 2021 and have had it covered a lot of the time. Also purchased pots made for glass but the cover is best. Since the glass top needs to remain covered, at least I can use the top as more counter space This product is perfect for additional counter space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it so much I bought one for my son’s house. Fit perfectly on my glass top. Helps protect it from and scratches. Heavy duty and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my LG stovetop perfectly and works great
reviews.reviewText: Needed something to provide some protection after dropping a coffee cup and smashing the stove glass. Ugh! $400 down the drain. Size fits perfectly, looks nice, neutral gray color and easy to clean. I was a little sceptical, so I turned on the stove for about two minutes to check out how durable it was. Passed the smoke test! It buckled a little bit but returned to normal after it cooled. Many old folks, like me, drop stuff all the time. This helps a whole bunch. Absolutely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is beautiful! It fits perfect on top of my stove burners! I’m not going to put the feet or the front piece on. Although, in time, I think I might because the feet will make it easier to move the piece as it goes on and off my stove. It’s a beautiful piece of wood. There are many stove top covers out there, with many different price points. Maybe I’ll get fancier in the future, but this piece is pretty, functional, and I’m thrilled with it!! Add a ++ at the end of my 5 star rating! You won’t, at least you shouldn’t be disappointed if you purchase this ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good match for original equipment
reviews.reviewText: Fit was good. Nice cover for a smooth glass top stove. Most everything was as advertised. Be careful of where you set it down as most anything with stick to the back of it. It is easy to place in the sink and wash off as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my new induction oven top nice and clean. When not in use, I place this product on top and am able to place clean pots and pans ontop without the worry of scratching the glass surface. Easy to fold and put aside till needed. Cleans easy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, elegant, Very Thick
reviews.reviewText: I extremely love this matt! This matt is so gorgeous! I ran into this. I instantly got excited. They are thick, jet black, excellent quality They match my appliances. They also look great with my counter matt cover and my dish tray that I purchased the same day from amazon. They all look great together. I will recommend anyone who read this review to get this matt. You will be very pleased. Thanks to the company that made this beautiful matt. I will definitely be purchasing this beautiful matt again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not complete coverage
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice stove top cover it however does not go completely edge to edge but it’s close enough. I do like that it’s less cumbersome than the big board that I had to put up and take down all the time and that it is washable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mat for glass top stove!
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly was I was looking for! Nice heavy material so it will last quite a while. Fits my stove perfectly now we don’t have to worry about anything accidentally dropping on stove and maybe scratching it or even worse, breaking the glass. I’m going to tell all my friends as it gives you extra space to do things on it!
